Specimen Type: Respiratory specimens (sputum, bronchoalveolar lavage, bronchial washings), tissue biopsies, other clinician-approved specimens
Purpose: Molecular detection of Coccidioides immitis/posadasii DNA to aid in diagnosis of coccidioidomycosis.
Equipment: Real-time PCR thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes, Class II biosafety cabinet
